# addressCheckingResult(range:components:)

**Type Method**

Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified address components.

## Declaration

```swift
class func addressCheckingResult(range: NSRange, components: [NSTextCheckingKey : String]) -> NSTextCheckingResult
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The range of the detected result.
- **components**: A dictionary containing the address components. The dictionary keys are described in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/keys-for-address-components].

## Return Value

Returns an `NSTextCheckingResult` with the specified [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/range] and a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/resultType] of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/address].

## Text Checking Results for Addresses

- **addressComponents**: The address dictionary of a type checking result.

items.description: The address dictionary of a type checking result.
